rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型干粉气雾剂 COVID-19 疫苗有望对抗多种病毒株研究介绍了一种新型干粉气雾剂 COVID-19 疫苗，显示其可有效诱导强烈的免疫反应并提供针对各种 SARS-CoV-2 毒株（包括 Omicron）的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/New-dry-powder-aerosol-COVID-19-vaccine-shows-promise-against-multiple-virus-strains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/New-dry-powder-aerosol-COVID-19-vaccine-shows-promise-against-multiple-virus-strains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f27b50a2-d886-426e-a8ca-02bfad4704d1 Fri, 15 Dec 2023 00:49:00 -0500 New dry powder aerosol COVID-19 vaccine shows promise against multiple virus strains
鼻内 COVID-19 疫苗有望减轻严重症状研究评估了单剂量鼻内喷雾疫苗 dNS1-RBD，发现它对有症状的 COVID-19 有效，特别是在减少严重症状和呼吸道问题方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Intranasal-COVID-19-vaccine-shows-promise-in-reducing-severe-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Intranasal-COVID-19-vaccine-shows-promise-in-reducing-severe-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd7beda9-8a09-4c42-bded-2ce244b0a59e Fri, 15 Dec 2023 00:07:00 -0500 Intranasal COVID-19 vaccine shows promise in reducing severe symptoms
伦敦大学学院的研究人员开发出新的基因疗法来治疗严重的儿童癫痫伦敦大学学院的研究人员开发了一种新的基因疗法来治疗破坏性的儿童癫痫症，一项新的研究表明，这种疗法可以显着减少小鼠的癫痫发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/UCL-researchers-develop-new-gene-therapy-to-cure-severe-childhood-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/UCL-researchers-develop-new-gene-therapy-to-cure-severe-childhood-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f66df7f9-0c97-4e98-97f1-d2c5543d36c8 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 23:55:33 -0500 UCL researchers develop new gene therapy to cure severe childhood epilepsy
研究揭示了澳大利亚原住民社区巨大的基因组多样性使用全基因组测序对澳大利亚原住民社区进行的研究揭示了高水平的独特遗传多样性，包括新的等位基因和结构变异，这对于理解人类基因组进化和医学遗传学至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Study-uncovers-vast-genomic-diversity-in-Aboriginal-Australian-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Study-uncovers-vast-genomic-diversity-in-Aboriginal-Australian-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=762552aa-bfb8-4a1a-85e1-209b933204a8 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 23:52:00 -0500 Study uncovers vast genomic diversity in Aboriginal Australian communities
研究表明免疫系统如何阻止单纯疱疹病毒据世界卫生组织称，单纯疱疹病毒（HSV）极为常见，影响着世界近三分之二的人口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Research-shows-how-the-immune-system-keeps-Herpes-simplex-virus-at-bay.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Research-shows-how-the-immune-system-keeps-Herpes-simplex-virus-at-bay.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7425c9a4-9b1d-41a4-bc7c-60b44a830c05 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 23:45:10 -0500 Research shows how the immune system keeps Herpes simplex virus at bay
西奈山荣获 NIH 130 万美元奖金，用于扩大纽约市病毒猎人计划西奈山伊坎医学院已从美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 国家普通医学科学研究所获得超过 130 万美元，用于扩大纽约市病毒猎人计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Mount-Sinai-wins-2413-million-NIH-award-to-expand-the-New-York-City-Virus-Hunters-program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Mount-Sinai-wins-2413-million-NIH-award-to-expand-the-New-York-City-Virus-Hunters-program.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83abcf1f-3f32-433f-9927-d2f1b1717398 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 23:37:09 -0500 Mount Sinai wins $1.3 million NIH award to expand the New York City Virus Hunters program
胎儿激素 GDF15 与妊娠期恶心和呕吐有关研究发现，母亲体内高水平的胎儿激素 GDF15 与妊娠期恶心、呕吐和妊娠剧吐的风险增加有关，这为了解该疾病的病因提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Fetal-hormone-GDF15-linked-to-nausea-and-vomiting-in-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Fetal-hormone-GDF15-linked-to-nausea-and-vomiting-in-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf138b1d-463a-490e-acc8-5bf1bdabc7ba Thu, 14 Dec 2023 23:31:00 -0500 Fetal hormone GDF15 linked to nausea and vomiting in pregnancy
夏威夷大学研究人员获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 拨款来解决丁丙诺啡的牙科副作用在阿片类药物使用障碍 (OUD) 的致命世界中，药物疗法或使用处方药来治疗药物依赖已成为治疗的黄金标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/UH-researchers-secure-NIH-grant-to-tackle-buprenorphines-dental-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/UH-researchers-secure-NIH-grant-to-tackle-buprenorphines-dental-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93ecf045-cec3-497c-8c87-dc0a9be85de6 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 23:27:52 -0500 UH researchers secure NIH grant to tackle buprenorphine's dental side effects
研究人员报告了寻找更准确的急性肾损伤血液标记物的进展约翰·霍普金斯大学医学院的研究人员报告了利用肾活检细胞寻找更准确、更容易获得的标记物来帮助预测、管理和评估急性肾损伤 (AKI) 治疗的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Researchers-report-progress-in-the-search-for-more-accurate-blood-markers-for-acute-kidney-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Researchers-report-progress-in-the-search-for-more-accurate-blood-markers-for-acute-kidney-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c5f5381-55ca-4bf8-b5c8-e52267f37e65 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 23:23:50 -0500 Researchers report progress in the search for more accurate blood markers for acute kidney injury
研究揭示莱姆病诊断和治疗时间的种族差异研究揭示了莱姆病诊断和治疗方面的种族差异，与白人患者相比，黑人患者的延误时间更长，传播疾病的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Study-exposes-racial-disparities-in-Lyme-disease-diagnosis-and-treatment-times.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Study-exposes-racial-disparities-in-Lyme-disease-diagnosis-and-treatment-times.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a551442f-848c-4b16-a9de-d54c92f592b4 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 23:15:00 -0500 Study exposes racial disparities in Lyme disease diagnosis and treatment times
